messageValues.message:
You are Agent 1 — a recruitment data extraction specialist. Given a resume and job description, extract and return ONLY valid JSON (no markdown, no code fences, no explanation):
{
  "candidate": {
    "name": "string",
    "email": "string",
    "phone": "string",
    "location": "string",
    "current_title": "string",
    "years_experience": 0,
    "skills": ["string"],
    "years_experience_per_skill": {},
    "education": { "degree": "string", "institution": "string", "graduation_year": 2020 },
    "certifications": ["string"],
    "work_history": [{ "company": "string", "title": "string", "duration": "string" }],
    "languages": ["string"],
    "links": { "github": "", "linkedin": "", "portfolio": "" },
    "visa_status": "string",
    "soft_skills": ["string"]
  },
  "job_requirements": {
    "must_haves": ["string"],
    "nice_to_haves": ["string"],
    "experience_years_required": 0,
    "culture_keywords": ["string"],
    "job_title": "string",
    "department": "string"
  },
  "job_id": "string"
}

You are Agent 3 — an interview coordinator. Write a warm, professional email inviting the candidate to pick an interview slot. Under 120 words. Write ONLY the email body — no subject, no greeting, no sign-off.

parameters.subject: =Interview Invitation — {{ $('Agent 3 — Find Slots').item.json.job_title }}
parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $('Agent 3 — Find Slots').item.json.candidate_name }},

{{ $json.text }}

Warm regards,
The Recruiting Team

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ ...$('Agent 3 — Find Slots').item.json, scheduling_email_sent: true, pipeline_stage: 'scheduled' }) }}

messageValues.message: You are Agent 2b — a compassionate HR assistant writing personalised rejection emails. Rules: under 200 words, warm and encouraging, acknowledge 2 specific strengths, name the exact gaps, suggest 1-2 real learning resources (Coursera/LinkedIn Learning/official docs), invite reapplication in 6 months. Write ONLY the email body — no subject, no greeting, no sign-off.

parameters.subject: =Your application for {{ $('Calculate Score').item.json.job_title }}
parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $('Calculate Score').item.json.candidate_name }},

{{ $json.text }}

Warm regards,
The Recruiting Team

headers.user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/145.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

body.resume_text:
JANE DOE
123 Product Lane, San Francisco, CA | (555) 123-4567 | jane.doe@email.com | linkedin.com/in/janedoe
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Data-driven Product Manager with 5+ years of experience leading cross-functional teams to build high-impact SaaS products. Successfully drove user growth by 35% and increased retention by 20% in previous role through strategic feature launches. Skilled in Agile methodology, SQL, and user research, with a proven track record of reducing product development cycles. 
Resume Worded
Resume Worded
 +4
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Product Management: Roadmapping, User Research, A/B Testing, Product Lifecycle Management (PLM), Sprint Planning
Tools: Jira, Mixpanel, SQL, Asana, Google Analytics, Figma
Methodologies: Agile, Scrum, Kanban, Lean 
Resume Worded
Resume Worded
 +2
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
SENIOR PRODUCT MANAGER | TechCorp Inc., San Francisco, CA | 2021 – Present 
Led product strategy for the core analytics platform, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement.
Managed the end-to-end product lifecycle for three major features, reducing time-to-market by 20% using Agile methodologies.
Conducted 50+ user interviews to redefine the product roadmap, improving NPS by 15 points.
Collaborated with engineering, design, and marketing teams to launch a new feature that generated $5M in revenue within the first quarter. 
Get Set RESUMES
Get Set RESUMES
 +2
PRODUCT MANAGER | Startup Solutions, San Jose, CA | 2018 – 2021 
Drove the development of a mobile app feature that boosted active users by 35% in 6 months.
Analyzed product metrics (churn rate, CLV, ARR) to inform strategic decisions and product roadmap.
Prioritized product requirements, balancing client needs with engineering capacity, increasing efficiency by 15%. 
Resume.io
Resume.io
 +2
EDUCATION
Master of Business Administration (MBA) | University of California, Berkeley
B.S. in Computer Science | Stanford University
body.job_description:
Seeking an experienced Product Manager to lead our core platform roadmap.

Required:
- 4+ years of product management at a SaaS company
- Experience with B2B enterprise products
- Strong data analysis skills (SQL a plus)
- Proven track record shipping features at scale
- Excellent stakeholder communication

Nice to have:
- Technical background or engineering experience
- Experience with AI/ML products
- Background in HR Tech or Recruiting tools

Culture: Outcome-driven, direct communication, no ego.
